summary: The story centers on a botched fish market robbery that leads to the involvement of the local police and a gangster out for revenge.
cast: Brendan Fraser|Colm Meaney|Martin McCann|Yaya DaCosta|David O'Hara|Michael Legge|Conor MacNeill|Frankie McCafferty|Rupert Wickham|Mary McCrossan|Amanda Hurwitz|Marie Jones|James Greene|Jamie Kierans|James Napier|Jonathan Harden|Jaz Pollock|Maggie Cronin|Brooke Hamilton|Sean Sloan|Alan McKee|Conleth Hill|Kieran Lagan|Antoinette Morelli|Foy Vance|Emma Hamilton|Louise Quinn|Michael Smyth|Hugh McLaughlin|Arlo Dylan Murphy McWilliams|Kauli Long|Tom Hollander|Amy Joyce|Martin John McCafferty|Cathan McRoberts|Roger Dane|Laurence Doherty|Timothy Fergusson|Amanda Girvan|Phelan Hardy|James Tolcher
title: Atraco en Belfast
